definition: to forward (a message, letter, article etc)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)

sentences.english: Please forward this letter to the Fhretsmanns and to the Woytts.
sentences.chinese: 請把這封信轉寄給埃雷茨曼夫婦和沃伊特夫婦。

sentences.english: I've got so much forward mail.
sentences.chinese: 我有好多轉寄來的郵件。

sentences.english: Enron forwarded a copy of that letter to petitioner .
sentences.chinese: 安然轉寄了一份該信函的複印件給上訴人。

sentences.english: It was forwarded to me from delaford .
sentences.chinese: 那是從德拉福德轉寄給我的。

sentences.english: Tom forgot to forward the email to his friend.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆忘記把電子郵件轉寄給朋友。

sentences.english: Please CC me on the e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 請將這封電子郵件用副件轉寄給我。

sentences.english: Add your name to the bottom of the list when forwarding this e-mai.
sentences.chinese: 轉寄這封郵件前，請把你的名字加入名單裏。

sentences.english: They forwarded the collect mail to his new address.
sentences.chinese: 他們把他的郵件轉寄到他的新地址，由他付費。

sentences.english: Please forward any letters to me while I'm on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我外出度假期間請把給我的信件都轉寄給我。

sentences.english: A letter and a parcel of books that arrived from Australia have been re-directed to you;
sentences.chinese: 澳洲寄來的一信與一包書都轉寄與你了。

sentences.english: Do not forward mails without permission of the sender.
sentences.chinese: 未得寄件人同意，請勿轉寄他人信件。

sentences.english: Wallace had suggested that Darwin forward the paper to Scottish geologist Charles Lyell.
sentences.chinese: 華萊士建議達爾文將論文轉寄給蘇格蘭地質學家賴爾。

sentences.english: The books were forwarded from Amsterdam to Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 這些書從阿姆斯特丹轉寄到東京。

sentences.english: Yes, I got your forward, thanks.
sentences.chinese: 知道，我有收到你轉寄的信，謝謝。

sentences.english: The letter was forwarded from a previous address.
sentences.chinese: 這封信是從先前的地址轉寄過來的。

definition: to travel around many countries (idiom); peregrinations/refers to the travels of Confucius
to order goods/to place an order
(Tw) private message/to send a private message
